message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $70, you take $30. It's in your best interest to accept now, as the money will be worth less with each round.
Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  Let's be more reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split. This gives you a larger share than if you wait for future rounds.
Bob, it seems like you're underestimating how inflation works against you. I'll offer you $45, which is worth more than $40 in the next round. Let's settle this now.
